attributes.action: I Tony dennis petition the goverment for a change in the law to the way the assesment is made for blue badges if you suffer from a mental health disability you can not get one without a physical disability.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mental health disorders are just as disabling as physical disability, and yet they are discriminated against, Just because you can`t see a mental health disorder they are treated as if they do not have one. Make it fair for all.
